name: Federal Electric Energy Decree
description: A law which institutes a power bill which charges citizens for consuming power, and gives a rebate to those that produce.

properties.Title: Power Bill
properties.UserDescription: Charge power consumers for consuming power, with exceptions for specfic districts related to government or titles.

properties.Title: Power Bill Rebate
properties.UserDescription: Gives a rebate for citizens that provide green power, such that it will offset any bill they may receieve for providing power.
